casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY as Trustee
v.
Peta-gaye S. WHITBOURNE, Widow, Heirs, Beneficiary, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2016

Shakir Ade Bey, self-represented, and Wayne Antho Deroy, self-represented, in support of the petition.

David M. Bizar, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants Shakir Ade Bey and Wayne Antho Deroy for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39353) is denied.
